p: the said dependant G. W. L. Allen, as Sheriff and Jailer of Wateurn County, release and discharge the said John W. Harden from his custody shown in which to whateurn the said Handen from liberty and it is further ordered that said Whateurn County pay the costs of this preceeding. J. R. Lewis Judge of the District Court Judge of the District Court of the third Judciial District of John W. Harden vs. G. W. L. Allen Order Filed Jan 9 1879 Jas Seary Clerk deputy
